name: data-objects
description: convert js object to graphql queries and mutations

scripts.build: lerna run build && mkdir -p @g2i && cp -rf packages/do-core/dist ./@g2i/data-objects/ && cp -rf packages/do-react/dist ./@g2i/data-objects-react/ && cp -rf packages/do-react-apollo/dist ./@g2i/data-objects-react-apollo/
